info.DESCRIPTION: information about RNBO and the running system

system_id.DESCRIPTION: a unique, one time generated id for this system

compiler_version.DESCRIPTION: the version of the compiler that this executable was built with

compiler_id.DESCRIPTION: the id of the compiler that this executable was built with

outdated.DESCRIPTION: Number of outdated packages detected on the system

supported.DESCRIPTION: Does this runner support remote upgrade/downgrade

aliases.DESCRIPTION: Ports and a list of their aliases

is_realtime.DESCRIPTION: indicates if jack is running in realtime mode or not

owns_server.DESCRIPTION: indicates if the runner manages/owns the server or not

num_periods.DESCRIPTION: Number of periods of playback latency

sync.DESCRIPTION: should the runner sync to/from jack's transport or not

io.DESCRIPTION: input and output counts: audio ins, audio outs, midi ins, midi outs
input and output counts: audio ins, audio outs, midi ins, midi outs
input and output counts: audio ins, audio outs, midi ins, midi outs

unload.DESCRIPTION: Unload a running instance by index, negative will unload all

load.DESCRIPTION: Load a pre-built patcher by name into the given index args: index patcher_name [instance_name]

save.DESCRIPTION: Save a set of instances assigning the given name

load.DESCRIPTION: Load a set with the given name

auto_connect_audio.DESCRIPTION: Automatically connect newly activated instances to audio i/o

auto_connect_audio_indexed.DESCRIPTION: Automatically connect newly activated instances to audio i/o, using the RNBO i/o index to inform the connections

auto_connect_midi.DESCRIPTION: Automatically connect newly activated instances to midi i/o

auto_start_last.DESCRIPTION: Automatically start the last instance configuration on runner startup

midiin1.DESCRIPTION: Port and its connections, send port names to change, see /rnbo/jack/ports for names to connect

midiout1.DESCRIPTION: Port and its connections, send port names to change, see /rnbo/jack/ports for names to connect

name.DESCRIPTION: The name of the loaded patcher

entries.DESCRIPTION: A list of presets that can be loaded

save.DESCRIPTION: Save the current settings as a preset with the given name

load.DESCRIPTION: Load a preset with the given name

loaded.DESCRIPTION: Indicates that a preset was loaded

delete.DESCRIPTION: Delete a preset with the given name

del.DESCRIPTION: Delete a preset with the given name

initial.DESCRIPTION: Indicate a preset, by name, that should be loaded every time this patch is reloaded. Set to an empty string to load the last loaded preset instead

midi_channel.DESCRIPTION: Indicate MIDI channel, none or omni (all) that should be used for changing presets via Program Changes.

in.DESCRIPTION: midi events in to your RNBO patch

out.DESCRIPTION: midi events out of your RNBO patch
